title: Michael Flynn Immunity Bid Stalls in Congress (Audio)
itunes:title: Michael Flynn Immunity Bid Stalls in Congress (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Andrew Wright, a professor at Savannah Law School, and Steve Vladeck, a professor at the University of Texas School of Law, discuss former national security adviser Michael Flynn's bid for immunity in the investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election. They speak with Greg Stohr and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
